snippet: Chinese security forces in Tibet and the western region of Xinjiang killed five people last week, according to reports, as violence and protests continued in those areas.
abstract: Five people are reportedly killed by Chinese security forces in Tibet and the western region of Xinjiang, areas where ethnic tensions are running high.
lead_paragraph: Chinese security forces in Tibet and the western region of Xinjiang killed five people last week, according to reports, as violence and protests continued in those areas.

headline.seo: Security Forces Kill at Least 5 in China
headline.main: Security Forces Kill at Least 5 in China
